headline.main: ARMY USES WOMEN IN TECHNICAL JOBS; Has Them Working in Arsenals, Quartermaster and Signal Corps and at Aberdeen FIRST AT PROVING GROUND Fourth of War Department's 700,000 Civilian Employes Are Now Women

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 1 -- One-fourth of the 700,000 civilian employes of the War Department are women working in both technical and supervisory fields, the department's Office of Civilian Personnel and Training said today.
abstract: Repts 1/4 of its civilian employes are women
snippet: WASHINGTON, July 1 -- One-fourth of the 700,000 civilian employes of the War Department are women working in both technical and supervisory fields, the department's Office of Civilian Personnel and Training said today....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
